channel.title: Projects on Mohammed Noman
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mohammed Noman

item.title: Automatic Beat Rate Detection in cardiomyocytes using Computer Vision
item.description: Proposed innovative system for automatic beat rate detection in human heart cells using image processing and machine learning.Validated the system on a dataset of 96 Gigabyte video clips Currently working to publish this research.

item.title: Intrusion Detection using Pyspark
item.description: Used dataset to build ML models in PySpark to detect if the incoming traffic is a threat, and also classify itâ€™s type. Complete ML procedure was followed such as Data Pre-Processing, Dealing with Data Imbalance, Feature Selection, Performance Measurement etc.

item.title: Personality Prediction using NLP
item.description: Built a Web-app using flask which predicts personality of a person from text using NLP. On this project, I learned a lot about python, NLTK, Spacy, Flask.
